TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ProfileSettings extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class ProfileSettings Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 配置 ASP.NET 事件配置文件。

span.span: Configures the ASP.NET event profiles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一种以编程方式访问和修改 `profiles` 配置文件的节的元素的方法 `healthMonitoring` 。The class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `profiles` element of the `healthMonitoring` section of a configuration file. 事件配置文件确定 ASP.NET 如何收集事件并将其引发到提供程序。Event profiles determine how events are collected by ASP.NET and raised to providers. ## Examples 此示例演示如何以声明方式为部分的多个属性指定值 `profiles` ，该部分也可以作为类的成员进行访问 。This example demonstrates how to specify values declaratively for several attributes of the `profiles` section, which can also be accessed as members of the class. 下面的配置文件节选显示了如何以声明方式为部分的多个属性指定值 `profiles` 。The following configuration file excerpt shows how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the `profiles` section. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类型引用的格式如下 (不需要用括号括起来) ： *Namespace*。*Typename*、 *Assemblyname*[，] [Version = x，] [Culture = y，] [PublicKeyToken = z]。The type reference is formed as follows (items in brackets are not required): *Namespace*.*Typename*, *Assemblyname*[,] [Version=x,] [Culture=y,] [PublicKeyToken=z]. 例如，"ExampleNameSpace，ExampleType，Version =% ASSEMBLY_VERSION%，Culture = 中立，PublicKeyToken =% MICROSOFT_PUBLICKEY%"For example, "ExampleNameSpace.ExampleType, Example.Assembly, Version=%ASSEMBLY_VERSION%, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=%MICROSOFT_PUBLICKEY%" ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. member this.MaxLimit : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置引发相同类型事件的最大次数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of times events of the same type are raised.

value.span: 引发相同类型事件的最大次数。

span.span: The maximum number of times events of the same type are raised.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值必须大于零。This property must have a value greater than zero. 通过将该值设置为，可以使其成为无限值 。The value can be made infinite by setting it to . 如果保存了配置节，则无效值可能会导致引发异常。Invalid values may cause an exception to be thrown when the configuration section is saved. 此属性指定将引发相同类型事件的最大次数。This property specifies the maximum number of times an event of the same type will be raised. 例如，如果值为 `10` ，则该事件将引发10次，并在之后被忽略。For example if the value is `10`, the event will be raised 10 times and ignored thereafter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#63](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/CS/healthmonitoringsection.cs#63)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#63](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/VB/healthmonitoringsection.vb#63)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MinInstances { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MinInstances : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置事件在其引发到提供程序前所出现的最少次数。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum number of event occurrences before the event is raised to the provider.

value.span: 事件在其激发到提供程序前所出现的最少次数。

span.span: The minimum number of event occurrences before the event is fired to the provider.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值必须大于零。This property must have a value greater than zero. 通过将该值设置为，可以使其成为无限值 。The value can be made infinite by setting it to . 如果保存了配置节，则无效值可能会导致引发异常。Invalid values may cause an exception to be thrown when the configuration section is saved. 此属性指定事件在事件引发到提供程序之前发生的最小次数。This property specifies the minimum number of times an event occurs before an event is raised to the provider. 例如，如果值为，则 `5` 表示在发生事件的第五个实例之前，ASP.NET 不会将事件引发到提供程序。For example, a value of `5` means that ASP.NET will not raise an event to the provider until the fifth instance of the event occurs. 如果值为无限 () ，则不会将任何事件引发到提供程序。If the value is infinite (), then no event will be raised to the provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#64](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/CS/healthmonitoringsection.cs#64)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection#64](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.HealthMonitoringSection/VB/healthmonitoringsection.vb#64)]

summary.span: 获取或设置两个相同类型事件之间的最小间隔。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum interval between two events of the same type.

value.span: 一个 ，指定两个相同类型事件之间的最小间隔。

span.span: A that specifies the minimum interval between two events of the same type.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过将该值设置为，可以使其成为无限值 。The value can be made infinite by setting it to . 如果保存了配置节，则无效值可能会导致异常。Invalid values may cause an exception when the configuration section is saved. 如果值为 ，则没有最小时间间隔。If the value is , then there is no minimum interval. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. The name of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须提供唯一的名称。A unique name is required. 当保存配置节时，重复的名称可能会导致数据丢失。Duplicate names may result in a loss of data when the configuration section is saved. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
